sourcesContent:
// card-form.component.ts import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-card-form', template: `

Formulaire et Carte

{{ formData.title }}
{{ formData.subtitle }}

{{ formData.description }}

{{ linkText }}
`, styles: [] }) export class CardFormComponent { formData = { title: '', subtitle: '', description: '', link: '' }; cardVisible = false; linkText = 'Voir plus'; submitForm() { this.cardVisible = true; } }
